de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate.simple

Class DefaultImvEvaluationUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate.AbstractImEvaluationUnitIetf
      • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate.simple.DefaultImvEvaluationUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImEvaluationComponent<ImAttribute>, ImEvaluationUnit, ImvEvaluationComponent, ImvEvaluationUnit

    public class DefaultImvEvaluationUnit
extends AbstractImEvaluationUnitIetf
implements ImvEvaluationUnit
    Default IMV evaluation unit. Does only log.
